articles.title: The Falcon and the Winter Soldier Creator: Avengers Salary Scene “Triggered Everybody" at Marvel Studios - ComicBook.com
articles.description: How do Avengers get paid? They don't, according to the series premiere of The Falcon and the Winter Soldier. Six months after blipping back to life alongside half of humanity in Avengers: Endgame, Sam Wilson (Anthony Mackie) needs a loan to keep his family's …
